website_summaries.verdict: A superb single cup coffee maker that has a built-in foaming arm and doesn't rely on coffee pods.
pros: Five brew types give you coffee the way you want it
Frother lets you easily make specialty drinks
Advanced thermal flavor extraction technology gives you delicious coffee every time
cons: Some users report breakdowns after a few months, but it doesn't seem to be a widespread issue

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable for me
customer_reviews.text: Well loved this when I first got it. Thought I was moving on from the Keurig brand. After two months I have the same problem I see so often in reviews. Clean light is on and does not work correctly. Back to Keurig. May only last for two years sometimes but that is better than two months.
customer_reviews.author: joyce scudder

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money! This coffee maker lasted 37 days. The cleaning light came on and after cleaning it several times it still won’t go off. Then the door where you put the coffee in started to stick open and now will not close completely. I have to hold it closed to make coffee. Too late to send it back to amazon and Ninja wants you to pay shipping both ways to fix the problem at around $40.00. Angry! Will not buy any product made by Ninja ever again!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn.

customer_reviews.title: I thought this was going to be a great product because of all the good reviews
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this coffe bar!! I thought this was going to be a great product because of all the good reviews. I hate this product. I think it’s very inconsistent with its brewing consistency. Sometimes it fills the cup size correctly and other times it only fills it halfway so your coffe is never the way you like it. The cleaning light came on, I cleaned it. Now it just blinks all the time and won’t shut off. (Like many people on this thread). Called customer service and they could have cared less. They basically told me tough, live with it. Really nice. Horrible experience all around. Get something else, don’t buy this. Trust me it’s a really shoddy product.
customer_reviews.author: Chef Joe

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye, Keurig
customer_reviews.text: Definitely an upgrade from my Keurig! Makes fantastic coffee, any way you'd like it. Takes a little getting used to that its not as fast as the keurig, but worth it. My only complaint, so far, is the cleaning process. It can literally take hours to run through over and over again before the clean light finally goes off. The series of blinks and beeps, as its way of telling you what to do is confusing. I hope they eventually make that part of the process a little easier. Overall, I'm pleased with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: SlagathorTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: good looks, not very practical
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because thinking that because the Ninja blender is excellent, maybe this coffee machine would also be great. Unfortunately, the marketing, the the description deceived me. On the positive side, it makes coffee. The bad news is that the coffee particularly good, one could this type of filtered coffee from machines less than half the price. But this machine comes with sensors a lights and different buttons that do not make the coffee better, nor do they expand the options, it's just marketing; there is no difference between all the options available, except of size. I would not recommend this machine at all.
customer_reviews.author: Txel

customer_reviews.title: I bought this and really liked it for a few months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and really liked it for a few months. I convinced my boss to buy one and mother as well. I loved having a single serve without a k cup. It was terrible to clean. The light never goes off. One day I spent 2 hours running through the cycles. After only 8 months (and only having an average of 1 cup a day) it stopped working. It tasted like water. I cleaned and cleaned it. My mother called shortly after to say that hers tasted fine but it only made lukewarm coffee. I'm so disappointed .
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Beckwith

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The best coffee maker purchase ever!! It comes with a very easy step coffee recipe book with so many different options from hot to cold to coffee made from different countries. Love the frost hook it has on the side, the pre-heat option,the big cup and straw it comes with, and the many coffee options and size options from brewing 4oz or 8oz to rich brew to classic etc. My hubby & I love it. Makes the coffee taste just right. No need to go to coffee maker shops anymore. Saves time and money!
customer_reviews.author: Luz360

customer_reviews.title: Love this coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee maker!! I am a momma with a baby so coffee is very important to my morning routine. This coffee maker has many different settings and is super easy to use. I make lattes and regular coffee all the time while my husband utilizes the iced drink function. Super easy to clean and it tells you when which I love. It takes up a bit more counter space than I'd like, but its worth it to have so many functions.
customer_reviews.author: smaldon

customer_reviews.title: Used 3 Years - Compact, Well-Made Coffee Maker For Fresh Gound Beans
customer_reviews.text: Update - I have used the coffee maker 6-7 days a week for three years. It works great and does a wonderful latte. Highly recommend. I've used this for about a month. The machine is compact and makes good individual cups of coffee as well as a variety of specialty coffees. The machine is very simple to use and came with clear directions. This is not a Keurig - type machine. You can either use ground coffee or grind your own. I always use my own fresh ground coffee because buying whole bean that you scoop yourself is the only way to ensure that your coffee is actually fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Avery Abernethy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I am so hooked on this machine after 1 day and so is my husband. I-m big on making all of the drinks that are made at your local barista stand. I make them for less than $1.00 and that's including buying the cups, straws, syrups, and coffee. Why pay the corner code stand 6.00 plus for a venti when I can do it for under 1.00 and it tastes really yummy.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Miller

customer_reviews.title: BROKE IN ONE YEAR
customer_reviews.text: Save your money!!!! I splurged on this coffee machine thinking that it would last me through graduate school but it's been just one year and already it's broken. The Clean filter light is permanently on. At first, it turned on every month or so, then the period between cleanings shrank in the last month to every week. Finally, it's permanently on. We've been cleaning it for hours, used vinegar, and googled for solutions. Nothing works. The machine is not cleaning as promised. Save your money and get a Keurig - we had one at my last house that still worked after five years. I'm very disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Stimson

customer_reviews.title: Be your own barista!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best gift I've ever purchased for myself! It makes the most amazing variety of coffee beverages. Combined with the Ninja recipe book you can make your own frappe frozen coffee drinks, hot coffee, iced coffee, just about anything you can get at an expensive coffee place, in minutes at home, and it's easy! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lori_1971

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good product
customer_reviews.text: After a few months I am giving it a 4. I would have given it 3.5. Overall it is nice. I like it better than using a kcup . Makes decent coffee, ice coffee, etc and the frother works good. I hate that the clean light comes on every 2 weeks. I use only filtered water. The cleaning process takes forever and you will need to be available for about an hour to complete the process. I probably wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Best Coffee Machine!!
customer_reviews.text: After ditching my Keurig, I was in the market for an amazing coffee machine and Ninja was it! After doing research and reviews on coffee machines, this one took the cake. So many people told me about and recommended it. I am so glad I made this purchase!! It’s the kind of coffee machine I have been looking for and the coffee option for (rich) flavor is my favorite! I love that it comes with a Ninja tumbler to put my hot or cold coffee in. The frother also won me over to make myself specialty drinks. I’ve told so many people about this and how they need to invest in this NOW!
customer_reviews.author: William Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Love coffee from Ninja
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves coffee made from Ninja. Our older model Ninja broke after having it for a couple of years of and using it every day. I started using distilled water instead of our well water because I think they may have contributed to the demise of our last Ninja (minerals in the well water). Hopefully this Ninja will last longer than my last one. I did buy the warranty this time.
customer_reviews.author: Gina O

customer_reviews.title: So Worth the Price!! Great Coffee Everyday!
customer_reviews.text: I use this Ninja Coffee Bar everyday and I absolutely love it!! Saving so much money from going out to S or P everyday! The Over Ice Brew works perfect and I've gotten to explore with how much coffee, creamer, chocolate, etc. The traveler mug that came with this is fantastic too. So very happy with this purchase. Fits right under my cupboards and doesn't take up too much space either. In my opinion, 'Drip Coffee' is always better than any 'pod!'
customer_reviews.author: A James

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a Christmas gift for friends -- they LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for friends -- they LOVE it! Note that the "frothing" attachment is NOT a steamer. It just blows very fine air bubbles into milk that you have to heat in advance - e.g., in the microwave. But although that detracts a bit from the operational convenience, it reduces time waiting for the unit itself to heat up, it reduces the cost of the item, and it eliminates what is often a big maintenance hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Art Majors

customer_reviews.title: Great, convenient system!
customer_reviews.text: The Ninja Coffee Bar Single-Serve System is an excellent alternative to expensive daily or weekly coffee purchases at Starbucks, Pete's, or Coffee Bean. It is convenient, easy to use, easy to clean, and includes a removable and washable filter as well as measuring spoons and a hot-and-cold cup. The various modes are easy to understand and adapt well to whichever type of coffee that I'm in the mood for. If I were to change one thing about this system, I would include an alarm/timer/clock to automatically turn the system on for pre-heating at a certain time in the morning before I leave for class or work.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee maker! It is perfect and easy to use...with NO PODS! The one thing I'll tell you...if you don't use it every day, DO NOT KEEP THE TANK ON THE SIDE WITH WATER IN IT. Take it off and keep it dry, or else the water will grow bacteria, and you will be drinking it until it clogs the water spout, and suddenly no coffee comes out anymore. Yes, I know from experience.
customer_reviews.author: El

customer_reviews.title: Requires cleaning often?
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this machine for about six months. I have already cleaned it once as the light came on. I use filtered water, so that surprised me. The light came on again in less than two months. I use this once per day, and occasionally one or two additional times. This seems a bit much regarding cleaning. I have left the light on and not cleaned it. Cleaning takes way too long!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Started out great...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this around April 2017 and this morning I retired it and brought out my old Krups coffee maker. It started out great but over time it brewed slower and slower. I tried cleaning it multiple times with the solution but the cleaning light was on and I was about to 10 minutes brewing one cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this a couple of days and so far I'm extremely impressed. It's a surprisingly simple little machine. The frother works great (I'm using almond milk and it even works for that). Seems very easy to clean and maintain. I've tried all the different brew types and they work as advertised. I think it would be even cooler if it had a built in little coffee grinder, but that's probably asking a lot. Overall I think this is way better than the pod machines and better for the environment too. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: The coffee is fine..
customer_reviews.text: Dissatisfied. It seems as if I am being alerted to clean the thing after every four or five cups made. Unreasonable. Or perhaps I got a lemon. Not sure. The coffee is fine...its doing what I would expect in that respect but constantly being alerted to "CLEAN" every few days is a bit ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: J.B. Witchdance

customer_reviews.title: I love this gadget for making coffee
customer_reviews.text: I love this gadget for making coffee. Pros: Built in milk frother is so convenient to use. No paper filters needed. Super easy to clean!!! Many different options for coffee. I even tried the drip with a teabag in my cup, it was good. Cons: None? The price is great for this quality!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Green

customer_reviews.title: Great flavored coffee
customer_reviews.text: Great flavored coffee. Way better than from the Keurig. As some of the reviews had complaint about the cleaning light staying on I will have to say it did the same thing for us after the first cleaning. I then ran another cleaning cycle with a stronger vinegar water mix as recommended and the light turned off. We are now using mainly distilled water.
customer_reviews.author: aggi

customer_reviews.title: Replacing Keurig? Look no further.
customer_reviews.text: There are some products that you use and hate...those that you use and love...and then those that you use and tell the world about. This is the latter of the three! I got this to replace our Keurig...I was tired of drinking dark water when what I really wanted was coffee. The coffee brewed in this thing actually tastes like coffee. I already convinced one friend to buy this thing. I'm sure there will be many more to come.
customer_reviews.author: mask

customer_reviews.title: Do your research before you decide.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy it, before you read about its cleaning error. just two weeks after I purchased it, it's cleaning mechanism given me a problem and I called the ninja they told me to send $20 to replace the piece. The machine been used for only 2 weeks and needed a repair for $20 ??? I'm returning the machine. Sad tho it worked very well in the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Alp

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed this machine, however for the price I would have expected it to last longer. At about 1.5 years (purchased 3/18), the machine is leaking water at the base. I use filtered water and do routine cleaning. Not sure why it’s leaking at the base. Very disappointing. It is easy to use & I use the frother daily.
customer_reviews.author: Laura12

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!! WILL BREAK IN UNDER TWO MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: Machine stopped working in under two months. Would not even go through cleaning cycle without failing. Ninja would not honor warranty and expected me to pay for the repair. Apparently the machines failing is a rather common problem. Do not buy this poorly made product. Ninja Customer service was dreadful and rude. Avoid their products.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Mackenstadt

customer_reviews.title: Beware of product quality
customer_reviews.text: Usually I don't write product reviews, Extremely disappointed with Ninja coffee maker. After using only for 2 weeks the "clean" LED came off and that's where the problems started. After trying ( there is clean button) several time, the LED never goes off, making the product useless. Called amazon as well as Ninja customer service helpline but no help.
customer_reviews.author: manneetu

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: After four months of using it once per day I cannot get the clean light off no matter how much vinegar I run through it. This is not the first time I cleaned it. I had a similar problem a couple months ago, but I eventually got it to go off. Now I cannot.
customer_reviews.author: brian Sutcliffe

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Love our new Ninja Coffee Bar! We, like many others, had a Keurig for years. It finally died so we replaced it with the Ninja....so glad we did! No more K-Cups! Uses your favorite ground coffee and tastes so much better!
customer_reviews.author: PhotoMomma

customer_reviews.title: Dump the Keurig!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it!!! Best purchase ever! Simple to operate, and it comes with a recipe book! You can make several different sized cups, brew cold coffee over ice and of course the built in frother is pretty awesome.. I'll never buy another coffee machine not made by Ninja!
customer_reviews.author: Truly Bianchi

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but does not steam
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Coffee is ready to brew in 3 mins, and while it does have a milk frother... it's misleading because it absolutely does not steam. Really not a big deal to heat up the milk prior to frothing, but don't assume because there is a frother that it will heat up the milk.
customer_reviews.author: steve.

customer_reviews.title: but the coffee is SO much better than out of a Keurig
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded to this from a Standard Keurig. I got to say, it may take longer for a cup of joe in the morning, but the coffee is SO much better than out of a Keurig. Good coffee doesnt brew in 90 seconds. Only problem I have with it is for some reason it seems to want to be cleaned very frequently. And the cleaning process is pretty confusing.
customer_reviews.author: The Smiths

customer_reviews.title: Never worked well.
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box the coffee bar would overfill coffee cups and travel mugs of designated capacity. As I got used to dealing with that it eventually showed signs of other failures eventually suffering the five beeps of death. Now it never fills a cup without multiple restarts. This machine is overly complicated with little or no benefit. My next coffee maker will be a simple pour over that won't take up counter top real estate and will only make as much coffee as I can put in a cup.
customer_reviews.author: Bennett Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Less waste than a kuerig
customer_reviews.text: We have only been using it a few weeks but I love it! It’s so much cheaper that using k-cups and I feel better about reducing my impact on the environment. I grind my beans at the beginning of the week and there is no need to use disposable filters. I also love the options of doing iced coffee and frothed milk!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This machine makes great tasting coffee. Whether it's for a single cup or a travel mug, it's the same simple operation - just select the size needed and press the button for your brewing preference ("Classic Brew"has been working fine for me). Easy to use and great tasting coffee, couldn't be more pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: J.R. from S.D.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful multipurpose coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful multipurpose coffee maker! No coffee filters needed. The price seems high but it will pay for itself. Eliminating the expense of filters and trips too the coffee shop's for latte's to go. The frothier is great and I haven't missed the steamed milk....
customer_reviews.author: Judy C.

customer_reviews.title: Makes delicious coffee and cappuccinos. My only issue is ...
customer_reviews.text: Makes delicious coffee and cappuccinos. My only issue is that it way overfills my mug. This is a normal 8oz mug set on classic coffee setting with no liquid in the mug to begin with. It's kicked my half/half habit in my coffee because it literally just doesn't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Bicyclistetcetera

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and money saving!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t so excited to get this!! I feel like my own barista making my favorite drinks without spending $5 per cup at Starbucks! The frother is really nice, and the whole deal took my only 5 minutes to get everything finished for my first morning coffee! I used the recipe in the book that comes with the Ninja for an Iced vanilla latte. Mmmm!!
customer_reviews.author: Misti

customer_reviews.title: Coffee Snob's Dream
customer_reviews.text: My husfriend surprised me with one of these snazzy things due to my increase in coffee snobbery, and also because he accidentally broke my beloved French press. This is a great deal, and can make a variety of things. The frother is good quality, and the coffee machine does a great job making espresso and strong coffee. Yuuuuum
customer_reviews.author: Forscience

customer_reviews.title: Bad ninja
customer_reviews.text: This product was good for the first month or so. The clean light came on. Cleaned it with vinigar and water. Light would not go of. Bought descaler. Light still wouldn't go off. Called Ninja. They finally sent a new one. However, they wanted me to oay to ship the new one to me. Told them no way! They finally shipped me a new one. It took them 10 days after they received my old one to send me the new one. After receiving the new one and using it for about a week, the clean light came on again. Don't buy this product. Ninja has terrible customer service and terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: matthew tweed

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had my single serve ninja coffe pit for a while now and it’s still not working correctly it’s not like they said it was
customer_reviews.author: tammy

customer_reviews.title: Guess I did good!
customer_reviews.text: Well I bought for my wife. She uses it every day and haven't had any complaints. Guess I did good!
customer_reviews.author: T.Rudd

customer_reviews.title: Love this coffee bar
customer_reviews.text: I really love this coffee maker. Had a Keurig, Had problems with it from day 1. It never gave me the right amount of coffee, would make a loud noise all of the time when on. Contacted Keurig and they had me clean it, and tell me that they would extend the warranty but didn't really help with what was wrong. So I bought this Ninja and I am glad I did. I use it all of the time and my husband loves the recipe book and we are going to try them all. I will never go back to Keurig again. Thanks Ninja
customer_reviews.author: Sherry K. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: HUGE design flaw.
customer_reviews.text: Just got mine today. Right off the bat: HUGE design flaw. The top vents steam. Well, place it on a counter under a cabinet - as one does with a coffee maker - and water condenses all over the underside of the cabinet and on the cabinet door! What? If you have IKEA cupboards like I do - over time it will literally eat the particle board. My DOORS are glass, but the CABINET isn't. The water was actually dripping off the glass doors and condensing under the cabinet bottom. Where are you supposed to put this thing??
customer_reviews.author: HSHOBX

customer_reviews.title: Her and her boyfriend absolutely love this!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my mother. Her and her boyfriend absolutely love this !! It does come with a mini recipe book too that I thought was a nice touch. It whips up a drink pretty speedy and warm water as well. I will buy for myself once my cofffee maker goes bad ! Worth the money on this !
customer_reviews.author: Hallie

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: goodbye kureg, this maker is awesome, it makes hot or iced coffee in several sizes including xl travel mug size, do yourself a favor buy this product, no more spending 5$ to 7$ for a large iced coffee from whatever vendor make it at home. It also has a mixer for frothing cream.
customer_reviews.author: RJC

customer_reviews.title: The frother works good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make lattes but it is really not an expresso machine. It is more like "coffee concentrate". The frother works good. Right now that is all I use and am drinking regular coffee with frothed cream or milk.
customer_reviews.author: JRN

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this coffee maker to my daughter for a Christmas gift. It broke within a few weeks and is completely unusable. The water will not stop flowing out of the dispenser. Instead of an 8 oz. cup of coffee, you will get a cup of water overflowing onto the counter top and floor.
customer_reviews.author: Jane S.

customer_reviews.title: Look forward to using this in the mornings
customer_reviews.text: Replacing my keurig with this...started to feel really bad about the plastic waste with the keurig and wanted to convert to something different. love the foamer, makes great coffee and easy to use. comes with a recipe book and i'm excited to use it in the morning...under $100 is an absolute win
customer_reviews.author: Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Keurig Is Dead To Me
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so sweet. Never had a better cup of coffee at home. I went from Keurig to this and I will never EVER go back.
customer_reviews.author: M. Headlock

customer_reviews.title: The cleaning feature needs to go
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee maker, except for the cleaning feature that beeps all the time and sometimes won't allow me to make coffee.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: This is a very poor coffee maker I have to clean it almost every ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very poor coffee maker I have to clean it almost every two weeks with vinegar and it takes over a gallon of it to get it cleaned. and I only use the single brew section of it... I barely make a coffee pot so I'm very frustrated and would like to return this ... And I'm the only one using it and I usually only have one cup in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: hidclare

customer_reviews.title: best coffee...
customer_reviews.text: I have used many coffee machines; all kinds. This is the best and most convenient. The coffee extraction is perfect and more flavorful, I love it. will buy another for the office.
customer_reviews.author: Fair Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating Operation
customer_reviews.text: Have had this system for about a year, as others have said it has some design flaws in both the cleaning button that will not shut off and the constant mess it makes all over the counter even after the beep signaling coffee is done it continues to drip and splatter. Also the pause in between brewing is ridiculous. Should have purchased a Cuisinart.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Draszt

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Brew
customer_reviews.text: This machine brews a great cup of coffee without bitterness or acid taste. I was skeptical but absolutely love it. When I go to Starbucks my 'drink of choice' is an Almond Milk Latte. The Ninja, with the built in frother, tastes the same!! The best part is NO pods. Not only can you use your favorite coffee but it's better for the environment. Every morning is a big thank you to Ninja and Amazon (for the great price)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a coffee maker not an espresso machine
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that there are several different ways you can make coffee on this machine. However I was looking for expresso machine. This is not quite it. The only problem I have is remembering to put the water in.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Sims

customer_reviews.title: Less than 1 year old and with minimal use and ...
customer_reviews.text: Less than 1 year old and with minimal use and it leaks. Wish I had read the reviews closer instead of relying on the name as it appears this is a common issue and now I am passed exchange date so stuck with a leaking machine.
customer_reviews.author: Donna B.

customer_reviews.title: I can't say enought about how much I LOVE Ninja products
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enought about how much I LOVE Ninja products.I replaced my old Ninja coffee maker with this one after looking at it for years. It's AMAZING. My husband and I drink our coffee differently and both of us have loved the results.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Pavey

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee bar
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee bar, the coffee taste so much better and stronger then K-cups. The only issue is I bought a ninja travel mug, and for some reason the machine always produces more then what the travel mug can hold.
customer_reviews.author: Tasyed786

customer_reviews.title: If I want to make my wife HAPPY all I need to say is "lets go get ...
customer_reviews.text: If I want to make my wife HAPPY all I need to say is "lets go get a coffee" But now she makes professional looking coffee, that look and taste better and cost much, much, much less then the one we had to drive to get !!! I'm not so dumb after all. All is Good!
customer_reviews.author: Kenny B

customer_reviews.title: this machine is very very good thank you
customer_reviews.text: this is truly on of the best coffee machine I have ever bought. I have had many machines this is so easy to use my Husban is able to get his own coffee in the morning and get the cup size he likes I would recommend this to all my friends . I like the different types of coffee we can make .
customer_reviews.author: Judith Megna

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Pain in the neck to clean!!! It makes coffee perfectly fine but I got rid of mine because it was such a task to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: This is the best coffee maker we could have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is the best coffee maker we could have ever purchased! It is so quick, and worth every single penny! We've had the keurig, and used the cuisinart and hamilton beach and none even remotely compare to this machine. If you have hesitations, DON'T. BUY IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Kuter

customer_reviews.title: Love my coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Love my coffee maker! I used to buy a Starbucks double shot every single day! Now, I make my own coffee, just black on ice by using the 4 ounce specialty drink feature! It’s better than Starbucks and tastes amazing!
customer_reviews.author: AlcazarStar

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee maker

product_meta.title: Ninja Single-Serve, Pod-Free Coffee Maker Bar with Hot and Iced Coffee, Auto-iQ, Built-In Milk Frother, 5 Brew Styles, and Water Reservoir (CF112)
product_meta.description: The next-generation Ninja Coffee bar is a single serve Coffee system-complete with a variety of brew types and sizes you can't get anywhere else. There's even a built-in frother with hot and cold frothing capabilities. Plus a host of delicious Coffee recipes you can create and enjoy, all from the Comfort of home. And it comes with the Ninja XL hot & cold Multi-Serve tumbler for hot or Iced coffee-big enough for you, or brew for two. Pod-free single-serve brewing gives you the freedom to use any brand of Coffee and to adjust the amount of grounds used-allowing you to achieve unlimited variety and personal customization of your Coffee drinks. Ninja's patent-pending advanced thermal flavor extraction technology allows you to unlock the full flavor potential of your favorite ground Coffee and enjoy a hot, great-tasting brew with variable levels of richness. Classic brew provides a smooth, balanced flavor from your favorite Coffee; rich brew's intense flavor stands up to milk, creamers, and flavorings; and over ice brew makes the perfect Iced Coffee that never tastes watered down. Ninja's signature brews, cafe forte and specialty, take Coffee to the next level. Cafe forte is a full-bodied cup of Coffee that amplifies your coffee's unique nuances down to the last Sip. Specialty brew is a Super-rich concentrate that can be combined with frothed milk to create bold, decadent coffeehouse-style drinks-hot or cold, layered or blended.Our Ninja Coffee bar system features an integrated frother that lets you brew, froth and drink in your favorite mug. In just seconds, you can transform hot or cold milk into a silky foam topping for all your favorite indulgent Coffee drinks.Only the Ninja Coffee bar system has Auto-iQ one-touch Intelligence technology, which draws just the right amount of water from the reservoir, based on the brew size and brew type you choose. And for the first time ever, the Ninja Coffee bar system offers XL settings for both Cups and travel mugs.
